headline: Evercore ISI, BofA, and JPMorgan Reduce PT on The Progressive Corporation (PGR) Amid Slowing Industry Fundamentals
summary: The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) is one of the most undervalued blue chip stocks to buy now. On January 7, 2026, Evercore ISI reduced its price target on The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) from $250 to $237, while reiterating an ‘In Line’ rating. TheFly reported that the firm describes 2026 as a challenging year for the property and casualty […]
